channel.title: Brand new 667 revision RSPS Contentzpk
channel.description:
Video [spoiler][video=youtube;r-5EpZUz3XY]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r-5EpZUz3XY[/video][/spoiler]
Pictures [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/brnNpic.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4rsVw1s.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dJolU1w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Gx8jwSR.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AJ9hn00.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U1ByLGd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WyDUuur.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FeVN0ZW.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AxwWWeZ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Tp9XWEO.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Gd9sZy7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vc8veQc.png[/img][/spoiler]
[WEBSITE LINK] [spoiler][url=http://contentzpk.comli.com/]http://contentzpk.comli.com/[/url][/spoiler]
Features
WE STICK TO UPDATING THE SERVER OF HOW A PLAYER WOULD LIKE IT WE DONT JUST UPDATE TO THINK WHAT WE WOULD LIKE
- Custom Dungeoneering has been added. - Spirit Three has been added. [UNDER CONSTRUCTION] - Custom Yell has been added. - Runespan has been added. [UNDER CONSTRUCTION] - Sawmill Area (My own way). - Fully working Farming(You can train Farming at every Farming Places) (Trefarm, flower, herb etc etc) - Added a better donator zone with NPC + Penguins Kills. - Fixed Shops. - Fixed Prices. - Fixed the crashing/dc issues. - All special attacks. - Obtainable Capes. - PvP Points + Shop - Flawless Pking! - AutoCasting - Working ArmourSets (Open with Chisel) - Lost of Donator Benefits. - Custom Yell Tags. - Set Your Own Yell Color. - Recipe For Disaster + With rewards. - Minigames - All Spellbooks. - Regular updates! - Multi Barrages - Working Summoning - Flawless Pking & Combat - Working Korasi’s Sword - Ancients. - Working weapon specs and effects - Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! - All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects). - Staff of light Special - RuneSpan. [under construction] - XP Counter. - View Stats (Right Click Option). - STable Xp Rate. - Chat & IPLogs. - Control Server Panel. - Automatic Server Messages. - Bank Tabs. - IpBanning. - Misic Hints. - Restarting. - ItemBonuses. - Spawned Objects. - Fight Pits. - Music Tab. - Degrading. - Godwars Creation. - Item Creations. - Experience Lamps. - Dominion Items! - Glacors. - Replaced the System Tab. - Warrior Guilds. - Barrows with coffins. - Drop Editor + Packer. - Fixed most of the NPC Nulls. - New Commands. - Usefull Admins+ Commands. - Most Correct Item Bonuses. - Switching. - Lodestone. - Summoning. - Full Fight Caves. - Full Kiln. - The correct emotes + configurations. - Money Pouch with correct sounds. - Starter Kit. - Repair Stand. - Correct Item requirements. - You can now cut every tree. - Agility. - New home Teleport Animation. - Comp Cape Requirements. - King Black Dragon. - Firemaking with correct anims. - Birds nest. - All Logs can now be fletched + Interfaces. - Everything that is 'raw' can now be cooked. - Fixed Bones On Altar + Burying. - Abyss. - Smithing - Living Rock Caverns. - You can't make fire now @ Banks. - It does has a Custom Spirit Tree & The Real One.(Just enable the real one). - Dice Bag ( Only in Friends Chat ). - You can now bury every Bones. - Flower Games (Pant & Pickup) - Slayer. + Reward Shop. - You will now get damage from the stalls.
More bosses has been added:
Glacors. Jadinko Lair. Ganodermic. Strykewyrms. Dagonnoth's. Armoured Zombies (Training Area). And more..
[Skills & Information]
So I was also started with BankPins I have come far with it, I didn't have time to finish it, when I was working with my new Project. So if you want bank pin so you can just make it complete.
Dungeoneering! We have a different Dungeoneering. There are currently 3 rooms. And each room has their own Npc. You can call them customs. They will give you Dungeoneering Tokens + Dungeoneering xp.
We have many bosses that works, such as; Queen Black Dragon, Kalphite Queen, King Black Dragon, Corp Beast, Bork, Tormented Demons and many more!
We have almost all slayer dungeons, and we also have dungeons such as; Godwars, Daggannoth Dungeon, Polypore Dungeon, Glacors Dungeon, Grotworms, Revenants, Jadinko and many more!.
We also do have moneypouch, at entrinthy where players can save their money!
RuneSpan works very well, it has some different options.
Slayer.. Summoning.. Alching.. BonesOnAltar Flawless Pking! Pvm.. & Much More

item.title: Brand new 667 revision RSPS Contentzpk
item.dc:creator: @calem calem
item.description:
@calem wrote:

Video
[spoiler][video=youtube;r-5EpZUz3XY]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r-5EpZUz3XY[/video][/spoiler]

Pictures
[spoiler]

[/spoiler]

[WEBSITE LINK] [spoiler]http://contentzpk.comli.com/[/spoiler]

Features

WE STICK TO UPDATING THE SERVER OF HOW A PLAYER WOULD LIKE IT
WE DONT JUST UPDATE TO THINK WHAT WE WOULD LIKE

  • Custom Dungeoneering has been added.
  • Spirit Three has been added. [UNDER CONSTRUCTION]
  • Custom Yell has been added.
  • Runespan has been added. [UNDER CONSTRUCTION]
  • Sawmill Area (My own way).
  • Fully working Farming(You can train Farming at every Farming Places) (Trefarm, flower, herb etc etc)
  • Added a better donator zone with NPC + Penguins Kills.
  • Fixed Shops.
  • Fixed Prices.
  • Fixed the crashing/dc issues.
  • All special attacks.
  • Obtainable Capes.
  • PvP Points + Shop
  • Flawless Pking!
  • AutoCasting
  • Working ArmourSets (Open with Chisel)
  • Lost of Donator Benefits.
  • Custom Yell Tags.
  • Set Your Own Yell Color.
  • Recipe For Disaster + With rewards.
  • Minigames
  • All Spellbooks.
  • Regular updates!
  • Multi Barrages
  • Working Summoning
  • Flawless Pking & Combat
  • Working Korasi’s Sword
  • Ancients.
  • Working weapon specs and effects
  • Working curses prayer book, including turmoil!
  • All Spirit shields(Creating & Effects).
  • Staff of light Special
  • RuneSpan. [under construction]
  • XP Counter.
  • View Stats (Right Click Option).
  • STable Xp Rate.
  • Chat & IPLogs.
  • Control Server Panel.
  • Automatic Server Messages.
  • Bank Tabs.
  • IpBanning.
  • Misic Hints.
  • Restarting.
  • ItemBonuses.
  • Spawned Objects.
  • Fight Pits.
  • Music Tab.
  • Degrading.
  • Godwars Creation.
  • Item Creations.
  • Experience Lamps.
  • Dominion Items!
  • Glacors.
  • Replaced the System Tab.
  • Warrior Guilds.
  • Barrows with coffins.
  • Drop Editor + Packer.
  • Fixed most of the NPC Nulls.
  • New Commands.
  • Usefull Admins+ Commands.
  • Most Correct Item Bonuses.
  • Switching.
  • Lodestone.
  • Summoning.
  • Full Fight Caves.
  • Full Kiln.
  • The correct emotes + configurations.
  • Money Pouch with correct sounds.
  • Starter Kit.
  • Repair Stand.
  • Correct Item requirements.
  • You can now cut every tree.
  • Agility.
  • New home Teleport Animation.
  • Comp Cape Requirements.
  • King Black Dragon.
  • Firemaking with correct anims.
  • Birds nest.
  • All Logs can now be fletched + Interfaces.
  • Everything that is ‘raw’ can now be cooked.
  • Fixed Bones On Altar + Burying.
  • Abyss.
  • Smithing
  • Living Rock Caverns.
  • You can’t make fire now @ Banks.
  • It does has a Custom Spirit Tree & The Real One.(Just enable the real one).
  • Dice Bag ( Only in Friends Chat ).
  • You can now bury every Bones.
  • Flower Games (Pant & Pickup)
  • Slayer. + Reward Shop.
  • You will now get damage from the stalls.

More bosses has been added:

Glacors.
Jadinko Lair.
Ganodermic.
Strykewyrms.
Dagonnoth’s.
Armoured Zombies (Training Area).
And more…

[Skills & Information]

So I was also started with BankPins I have come far with it,
I didn’t have time to finish it,
when I was working with my new Project.
So if you want bank pin so you can just make it complete.

Dungeoneering!
We have a different Dungeoneering.
There are currently 3 rooms.
And each room has their own Npc.
You can call them customs.
They will give you Dungeoneering Tokens + Dungeoneering xp.

We have many bosses that works, such as; Queen Black Dragon,
Kalphite Queen, King Black Dragon, Corp Beast, Bork,
Tormented Demons and many more!

We have almost all slayer dungeons,
and we also have dungeons such as; Godwars, Daggannoth Dungeon,
Polypore Dungeon, Glacors Dungeon, Grotworms,
Revenants, Jadinko and many more!.

We also do have moneypouch,
at entrinthy where players can save their money!

RuneSpan works very well,
it has some different options.

Slayer…
Summoning…
Alching…
BonesOnAltar
Flawless Pking!
Pvm…
& Much More
